name: Anne Speed
biography: Anne Speed was born in Collins, Mississippi. Her parents instilled faith and a strong work ethic within her which has lead her to be successful today. Her first time to be booked in a movie was in 2013 Grudge Match. Since then she has been avidly accepting casting calls, featured spots and commercials due to her love of the film industry. Graduated from the University of Southern Mississippi, she and her two children reside in Hattiesburg, MS. Her hobbies are skydiving, photography and art.::Anne Speed
filmography: Same Kind of Different as Me
